task.title: Creating an Item
task.abstract: Staff users create items to represent a good or service that is available for purchase.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Item tab in the eStore app and click the New button.
Enter the Item Name and Item Price.
Select the Item Class and Business Group using the lookups and click Save.
step.info: Enter the Display Name, Line Description, and Image URL in order for the fields to display on campaign pages and in the Shopping Cart.
Select the Enable Access Permissions checkbox to implement tiered pricing.

step.cmd: Select the Is Active checkbox and click Save.

taskbody.result: A new item is created and available for sale via the eStore.
